entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023
